summary: Dr. Gary J. Sprouse, M.D., was found to have engaged in unprofessional conduct, willfully falsifying medical records, making misrepresentations in treatment, and submitting false statements for services not rendered. He documented and billed for patient assessments he did not perform, often for patients who were not present at the facility. As a result, his medical license was suspended for a minimum of six months, he was reprimanded, ordered to complete an ethics course, and fined $35,000.
